about_the_game:
Turbo Shell is a fast-paced 2D platformer with a unique movement mechanic: instead of running and jumping, you push and pull yourself through a sci-fi world with the help of the EPS (Egg Propulsion System).

The free demo includes the first world with 16 levels.

Pick up the EPS and get going



The EPS (Egg Propulsion System) allows you to glide through the sci-fi world of Turbo Shell: push yourself off surfaces within a short range using the blue ray, or pull yourself towards others using the orange ray.

Using the EPS is easy to learn. By perfecting your moves, you'll find even faster and more efficient ways to complete a level. Enjoy the rewarding feeling of skillfully flying through the space station and climb up the ranks on the leaderboard.

Overcome obstacles and avoid hazards



Sizzling laser barriers, flying buzzsaws and hazardous corridors will pave your path. Avoid them to make sure you won't splash!

Turbo Shell is a precision platformer and completing levels without getting smashed will become more difficult on the way. Instant respawns and checkpoints will help you stay motivated and reach your goal.

Collect all Targets




The universe as we know it is in danger - but as Craig, you can save it by collecting targets that are scattered throughout each level. Make sure to reach them all in high-speed to get rewarded with a spot on the leaderboard!




  • Unique movement mechanic:
    Push and pull yourself through space - in the first game that's both repulsive and attractive at the same time.
  • Fast-paced precision platformer:
    Collect all targets as fast as you can - but beware of the deadly hazards...
  • Challenging and rewarding:
    Prepare to splash. A lot. Instant respawns will get you going again in no time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX 11 compatible with at least 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX 11 compatible with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Turbo Shell is a fast-paced 2D platformer with a unique movement mechanic: instead of running and jumping, you push and pull yourself through levels with the help of a special device. Traverse through ever more challenging levels as Craig The Egg, collect rewards – and beat your friends’ best time!
